column1: #Text=At most the city should buy back all exisitng licences for the cost it currently charges for a new licence, 4.5 grand, less admin fee.
#Text=That is the most the city should compensate licence holders for, because that is the actual cost of a licence!
#Text=Then, as the globe said the city should simply charge all drivers a yearly permit where they also have to show car maintenance and insurance.
